Hero.desc: As Technomay, we produce scalable digital solutions for your business using the latest technologies.

About.description: Technomay aims to create national added value by focusing on current and future technologies in R&D and P&D fields. It aims to offer solutions that facilitate daily life on a global scale with the projects it develops and its innovative production approach.
About.vision_desc: To be a globally recognized R&D company; to offer effective and sustainable solutions worldwide by bringing future technologies to life today.
About.mission_desc: We aim to produce sustainable solutions by providing top-level service to our customers in the field of innovation and technology.

Features.title: What We Offer?
Features.subtitle: We combine technology with art and produce modern solutions that add value to your business.

items.item1_desc: We bring future technologies to life today and make a difference with continuous development.
items.item2_desc: We reduce foreign dependency by empowering the ecosystem with domestic production and innovation.
items.item3_desc: We compete in the global market by producing world-class solutions.
items.item4_desc: We develop environmentally sensitive, long-term technologies that increase efficiency.
items.item5_desc: We build trust with transparent processes and international quality standards.
items.item6_desc: Creative and solution-oriented projects that center on user experience.

Footer.summary: Focusing on future technologies in R&D and P&D, we produce added value on a national and global scale.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.description: We are shaping the future of technology.
AboutPage.missionVisionDesc: As Technomay, we produce sustainable digital solutions based on innovation and excellence.
AboutPage.visionDesc: To be a globally recognized R&D partner that creates sustainable value through innovation.
AboutPage.missionDesc: We aim to produce sustainable solutions by providing top-level service to our customers.

ServicesPage.title: Our Services
ServicesPage.description: We guide your technological transformation and produce end-to-end digital solutions.

services.title: Web and Software Development
services.desc: We develop high-performance and scalable web applications.

services.title: Mobile Application
services.desc: We design native and cross-platform mobile applications.

services.title: Cloud Solutions
services.desc: We modernize your systems on AWS, Azure and Google Cloud.

services.title: Artificial Intelligence & ML
services.desc: We train machine learning and AI models.

services.title: Cyber Security
services.desc: We conduct penetration tests and security audits.

services.title: IoT Systems
services.desc: We connect your devices with IoT technology.

kvkk.title: GDPR Clarification Text
kvkk.description: Protection of your personal data is our priority.
kvkk.content: As Technomay, in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 ("GDPR"), we process your personal data as the data controller for the purposes described below.
kvkk.dataControllerDesc: Our company processes your personal data lawfully.
kvkk.processingPurposeDesc: Your data is processed for service provision and customer satisfaction.
